radiographic_examinations.findings: Enlarged multi-follicular right and left ovaries measuring 4.5 x 3.5 x 3.1 cm and 7.1 x 3.5 x 6.6 cm, respectively.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressive bilateral ovarian enlargement observed, leading to bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilaterally enlarged polyfollicular right and left ovaries measuring 15 cm and 17 cm, respectively.
